comments.author: Husky
comments.content: Nootropics - apparently few or no side effects

comments.author: randy
comments.content: @Husky the wiki page on Nootropics suggests http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U4EA as an alternative for modafinil, but 'significantly more abuse potential'. Not sure what to think of that. Plus, I really hate smoking, so no nicotine or cannabis for me..
